# ggplot2 (graphs)

<details>

<summary>`Tutorials/E-Books`</summary>

-   [**Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction** by Kieran Healy](https://socviz.co)

    -   Good for **beginners**. Gives a solid introduction to `ggplot2` (mapping, aesthetics, etc.) and has a great section on plotting geographical data with maps.

-   [**R Graphics Cookbook** by Winston Chang](https://r-graphics.org/)

    -   Good for **beginners** and beyond. Gives starter "recipes" for creating a number of different plots, annotations, etc. Includes north of 150 "recipes."

</details>
